title: Completion of the Agriculture Innovation and Technology Center

tasks.task: Setup and completion of a hydroponic system in two tunnel greenhouses for agricultural modernization.
subtasks: Collaborate with a five-member technical team.
Design and install two tunnel greenhouses.
Equip greenhouses with a nutrient film technique hydroponic system.
Align system capacity to support over 2,600 plants (1,425 in one and 1,200 in the other).
Ensure efficient water and fertilizer use, reducing waste.
Prepare the facility for educating local farmers and showcasing hydroponic benefits.
Integrate modern technology for precision agriculture, promoting sustainable practices.

tasks.task: Educate local community (e.g., school children) about the new hydroponic system.
subtasks: Coordinate presentations or demonstrations for school visitors.

tasks.task: Strengthen agricultural ties between St. Lucia and Guyana through regional cooperation.
subtasks: Collaborate with Guyana’s technical team on the project.
Showcase the project as a regional model for agricultural innovation.
